pkgmetadata.longdescription: Phase II Clinical Trial Design for Multinomial Endpoints // Provide multinomial design methods under intersection-union test (IUT) and union-intersection test (UIT) scheme for Phase II trial. The design types include : Minimax (minimize the maximum sample size), Optimal (minimize the expected sample size), Admissible (minimize the Bayesian risk) and Maxpower (maximize the exact power level).
